about_the_game:
🎣 Dive into the Ultimate Real VR Fishing Experience!

Explore stunningly realistic environments with Real VR Fishing. Relax in 40 beautiful maps and expand your adventure with DLC packs, unlocking 95 fishing locations. Discover 150+ fish species in the base game and over 300 species with DLC content. Whether you’re a seasoned angler or a beginner, enjoy the peaceful ambiance and improve your skills.

👥 Solo or Multiplayer (Up to 4 Players)

Fish alone or join friends in multiplayer. Share the thrill, chat in real-time, and enjoy fishing together. Real VR Fishing is more than a game—it’s a space to bond and unwind.

💬 What Players Are Saying:

"Real VR Fishing is my go-to escape—like a vacation in VR." – Shroo****

"Breathtaking visuals, and the multiplayer makes sharing the joy of fishing easy." – squir***

These reviews show why players love Real VR Fishing.

🏆 Award-Winning & Constantly Updated

Voted Facebook Oculus Game of the Year 2019, Real VR Fishing offers monthly updates and seasonal events, adding new challenges and fish to catch.

✨ Customize, Progress, and Master Fishing

Level up, unlock rare fish, and customize your avatar and aquarium. Whether you start in Normal Mode or aim for Expert Mode, find new ways to enjoy VR fishing.

🎧 Fish, Stream, and Multitask

Listen to music, watch videos, or browse the web while fishing using the built-in web browser. It’s the perfect way to unwind.

💥 Download Now and Start Your VR Adventure!

name: Real VR Fishing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or greater / AMD FX 8350 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 / AMD R9 390X
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: Steam VR. Meta Headsets, Valve Index, HTC Vive only
  • Additional Notes: Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3, Oculus Rift S, HTC Vive, Valve Index
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“Real VR Fishing Brings Stunning Environments To Quest”
Upload VR

“Best Recreation app on the Quest 2019”
9.5 – Quest On

“Real VR Fishing wants to make you feel like you’re actually stood by the water.”
8 – 6 DoF Review

Relax in 40 beautiful maps and expand your adventure with DLC packs, unlocking 95 fishing locations. Discover 150+ fish species in the base game and over 300 species with DLC.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Spanish - Latin America, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
